DOC.brief_title: Exploring Effects Muse Spire Stress Management
DOC.detailed_description: Both Muse Spire recent technology could improve understand stress management enhance quality healthcare . The goal study evaluate Spire Muse help individual self-manage stress . Spire design discrete clip-on tracker monitor change respiration rate . With companion app , device display breathe rate real time alert user push notification time tension . Studies show control breathing reduces stress . On hand , Muse headset device us EEG ( electroencephalogram ) sensor measure electric brain frequency . Muse guide user form simplify meditation give feedback real time ( i.e . calm , neutral , active ) audio clue improve concentration . Previous study show engage meditation potential reduce anxiety stress .
